info.title: History. Mariupola school started a patriot flushmob.
info.short_text: The fifth grader, Kostya Malik, recorded a video reading the salute over Leningrad. Peterburg schoolchildren supported the boy and joined the social media.

info.title: Peskov compared the EU war talks with Russia with a scary bear.

info.short_text: The claimant sought compensation for moral harm in connection with an offensive event at the club.
